params.receiver: Address to receive the minted shares

reportRebalance(uint256,uint256).details: Called by off-chain rebalancer or owner

asset().notice: Returns the underlying asset address (USDC in Phase 1)

deposit(uint256,address).notice: Deposits assets and mints shares to receiver

getBasketId().notice: Returns the basket ID for this vault

reportRebalance(uint256,uint256).notice: Reports a rebalance (future-friendly function, may no-op in early Phase 1)

totalAssets().notice: Returns the total amount of underlying assets managed by the vault
